product_name: Yakima BedRock Multisport Truck Bed Rack Towers - Set of 4
long_description: Yakima BedRock truck bed towers help you make the most of your cargo space by letting you mount a rooftop box or bike rack over your truck bed so you can stash your gear underneath. BedRock towers mount to truck bed side rails, no tools or drilling required; crossbars sold separately. Includes 4 SKS locks and keys to secure towers to truck.
short_description: Yakima BedRock truck bed towers help you make the most of your cargo space by letting you mount a rooftop box or bike rack over your truck bed so you can stash your gear underneath.
